stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit, or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, end the run.
text: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, end the run.
title: Caprice Nisei
